Rick Whitfield, PGA Professional
"Ask Dr Putt"
Training aids and golf instruction from an experienced PGA Professional.
Rick Whitfield, PGA Pro
During Rick Whitfield‚Äôs 40-year career as a PGA Golf Professional, he has been the Director of Golf at some of the most respected golf clubs in the association, including
The Creek Club, Locust Valley, NY
Jupiter Island Club, Jupiter Island, FL
Country Club of Fairfield, Fairfield, CT
Sailfish Point Golf Club, Stuart, FL
Loblolly, Hobe Sound, FL.
Rick was named one of the Top 100 Teachers in America by Golf Magazine in 2004 and twice named Teacher of the Year by the PGA South Florida Section. Now running his Putting Analysis Studio out of Pinehurst, NC, and Hobe Sound, FL.
Practice and lower your scores through precise putter fitting.
